text: Saud bin Faisal bin Abdulaziz Al Saud (), also known as Saud Al Faisal (; 2 January 1940 â€“ 9 July 2015), was a Saudi diplomat and statesman. He served as Saudi Arabia's foreign minister from 1975 to 2015. By the time of his retirement, he was the world's longest-serving foreign minister. He was a member of the Saudi royal family. Saud died on 9 July 2015 from complications from Parkinson's disease after going through surgery in Los Angeles, California at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Asian diplomats Category:Saudi Arabian politicians
title: Saud bin Faisal
